headline: PayPal’s New CEO And Embedded Payments Push Challenge Depressed Valuation
summary: PayPal Holdings (NasdaqGS:PYPL) has appointed Enrique Lores, former President and CEO of HP Inc., as its new CEO. The company is expanding embedded payments through new integrations with UpdatePromise for automotive service payments and Authvia for text based transactions. These moves reflect a push to make PayPal and Venmo more central to everyday digital commerce experiences. For investors watching NasdaqGS:PYPL, this leadership transition comes after a multi year period of weak share...
